pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing and Visualizing Symptom Checker Performance // Easily analyze and visualize the performance of symptom checkers. This package can be used to gain comprehensive insights into the performance of single symptom checkers or the performance of multiple symptom checkers. It can be used to easily compare these symptom checkers across several metrics to gain an understanding of their strengths and weaknesses. The metrics are developed in Kopka et al. (2023) doi:10.1177/20552076231194929.
